txt.en: 'My greetings again, [placeholder]! Anytime you would like to return to Furtherholm, I would be happy to guide you there once again.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
Ikhajât has offered to guide you back to the tropical island of Furtherholm during the Midsummer Festival.
Continue talking to Ikhajât, should you wish to return to Furtherholm.
'Are you ready to travel to Furtherholm? Then let us be off!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: When you continue this quest, you will swiftly travel to Furtherholm in the Shield Isles.</rgb>
